response.overview: When the 86 year old matriarch, Mee-Mah Royal was hospitalized after a stroke, her 8 children became irreconcilably divided over her care and small estate. Through the stories of her children, grandchildren, and supporting interviews with prominent researchers, lawyers, and financial plannersâ€“ Black Heirlooms examines the need for intergenerational planning to transfer family wealth, traditions, and values.
response.title: Black Heirlooms
